title: Welcome home to this adorable 4bed 2bath home!
posting_body: Welcome home to this adorable 4bed 2bath home!
Walk-in to the open concept living, dining and kitchen areas with natural light pouring in through  the big windows.
Rich dark espresso cabinets, granite counter tops and stainless appliances are ready for you to host and entertain your friends and family!
Porcelain wood like tile adorns the main living areas are durable and great for kids and pets.
Split bedrooms allowing privacy in your new spacious master retreat to relax in after your day of work and kids activities.
The other 3 wonderful sized bedrooms each have their own closet and are located at the front of the home just off the entry of the house sharing a hallway and the second bathroom!
Also a separate great size utility room.
Nice covered patio to grill under while the kids play.
Don't forget about the community pool with cabana and playground to keep close to home but be able to enjoy fun in the sun.
Just minutes from Fort Worth Nature Center, Sundance Square and DFW Airport!
